wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General Sir Alfred Robert Martin  (30 March 1853 – 27 October 1926) was a British officer in the Indian Army.

response: *Alfred Martin (baseball) (1928–1989), known as Billy, American baseball player
*Alfred Martin (painter) (1888–1950), Belgian artist; see Catalog of paintings in the Louvre Museum
